snippet: Parents and educators are expressing strong concern about the central role of standardized testing in the assessment and overall education of their children and students.
lead_paragraph: Parents and educators are expressing strong concern about the central role of standardized testing in the assessment and overall education of their children and students.

headline.seo: Student Assessments Facing Stiff Backlash in Texas
headline.main: In Texas, a Backlash Against Student Testing
